title: Research Topic: $TRUMP Token Launch: Real-Time Presidential Bribery Infrastructure (Jan 20, 2025)
summary: Based on the research priority '$TRUMP Token Launch: Real-Time Presidential Bribery Infrastructure (Jan 20, 2025)', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Document the unprecedented launch of $TRUMP and $MELANIA tokens on Inauguration Day 2025, creating the first real-time presidential influence market in history. Focus on the timing, scale, and immedia... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
